column4: Tesla buys Germany's Grohmann Engineering to help ramp up electric car production
column5: FRANKFURT Electric carmaker Tesla Motors Inc  has agreed to buy Germany's Grohmann Engineering GmbH  which develops automated manufacturing systems for batteries and fuel cells  as the California-based company seeks to expand its production more than sixfold by 2018.

column4: UPDATE 2-Tesla buys Germany's Grohmann Engineering to help ramp up electric car production
column5: * Tesla buys German industrial automation specialist Grohmann

column4: Tesla to buy Germany-based Grohmann Engineering
column5: Nov 8 Electric car maker Tesla Motors Inc  said on Tuesday it would buy Germany-based Grohmann Engineering to improve its automated manufacturing systems.

column4: BRIEF-Tesla Motors to buy Grohmann Engineering
column5: * Says has entered into an agreement to acquire Grohmann Engineering

column4: BRIEF-Qualcomm  Preh sign commercial wireless electric vehicle charging license agreement
column5: * Preh will include Qualcomm Halo WEVC technology in its product portfolio
